comments.body: Bless the person who made the question paper.  It's the only paper I've seen in 2nd year which required the students to have a good perception of the syllabus. For most other papers, you can pretty much answer all of the questions if you had just mugged up some tables.

Yeah u need to understand the sub inorder to answer it 
And all mcqs were like which of the following are correct lol ðŸ˜†
